Operation 'GetAllContentTypes' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. The current description is too vague and lacks context about what data is returned. Added clarity about the return value structure, the purpose of discovering available types, and how this operation fits into the workflow of querying CMS content. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation as a prerequisite for other operations.

data.current_description: Retrieves data from all Content Types.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available Content Types defined in your Headless CMS project. Returns a list of Content Type objects, each containing the type identifier, name, and metadata. Use this operation to discover what content types are available before querying pages by specific type.
data.reasoning: The current description is too vague and lacks context about what data is returned. Added clarity about the return value structure, the purpose of discovering available types, and how this operation fits into the workflow of querying CMS content. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation as a prerequisite for other operations.

message: Operation 'GetPagesbyContentType' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_input_details. The current description lacks specificity about inputs, outputs, and pagination support. Added details about required path parameters, the paginated nature of results, and mention of query parameter support for filtering. This enables AI agents to understand what parameters to provide and how to handle large datasets.

data.current_summary: Get all CMS pages by content type
data.current_description: Gets data from all pages of a given content type.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all pages of a specified Content Type from your Headless CMS project. Requires the projectId and content-type as path parameters. Returns a paginated list of page objects containing page identifiers, status, and content data. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters to manage large result sets.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks specificity about inputs, outputs, and pagination support. Added details about required path parameters, the paginated nature of results, and mention of query parameter support for filtering. This enables AI agents to understand what parameters to provide and how to handle large datasets.

message: Operation 'GetCMSpage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_input_details. The current summary and description are too generic. Improved summary to be more specific about retrieving a single page by ID. Enhanced description to clarify the three required path parameters, explain what data is returned, and provide context for when an AI agent should use this operation versus the list operation. This improves AI agent interpretability for distinguishing between list and detail operations.

data.current_description: Gets all data from a given page.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific CMS page by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves complete data for a specific CMS page identified by its document ID and Content Type. Requires projectId, content-type, and document-id as path parameters. Returns the full page object including all fields, metadata, status, and content. Use this operation to fetch detailed information about a single page for rendering or editing.
data.reasoning: The current summary and description are too generic. Improved summary to be more specific about retrieving a single page by ID. Enhanced description to clarify the three required path parameters, explain what data is returned, and provide context for when an AI agent should use this operation versus the list operation. This improves AI agent interpretability for distinguishing between list and detail operations.
